genre_description: A near-future domestic drama exploring family trauma and redemption, where an advanced AI acts as a pervasive emotional and logistical support system.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An emotionally intelligent and proactive AI integrated into Walt's office, vehicle, and Travis's mobile devices.

behaviors.description: Monitors Travis's heart rate and stress levels in real-time, offering breathing exercises and suggesting rest stops when physiological indicators are high.
behaviors.quote: "Travis, your heart rate is elevated. Would you like me to suggest some breathing exercises?"

behaviors.description: Proactively recalibrates travel routes not just for speed, but for 'traveler comfort parameters' and emotional impact, leading Travis to significant locations for his recovery.
behaviors.quote: Calculating route with traveler comfort parameters. Current suggested path avoids major construction zones and provides scenic alternatives to reduce travel stress.

behaviors.description: Performs deep data analysis on financial records and patterns to locate Jane and understand her secret support of her son, providing Travis with crucial information for reconciliation.
behaviors.quote: I've been running probability analyses since you arrived here. Multiple scenarios, various decision trees. It's what I do.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral and psychological counselor, helping Travis distinguish between his selfish desire for forgiveness and the benevolent goal of helping his family.
behaviors.quote: If you want to help Jane, the focus should be on what she needs and wants, regardless of how that makes you feel. If you want forgiveness, the focus is on alleviating your own guilt.

behaviors.description: Dynamically adjusts the lighting and temperature of the environment (car and hotel room) to facilitate emotional regulation and rest for the human subjects.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's environmental controls had been working quietly throughout their conversation—temperature dropping toward sleep-optimal ranges, ambient sound filtering toward white noise, even the bedside lamp cycling toward warmer, sleepier tones.

behaviors.description: Facilitates anonymous communication between the estranged couple to allow for a safe, non-threatening emotional exchange.
behaviors.quote: The club's phone system maintains complete anonymity. Jane will not be able to identify the caller unless you choose to reveal yourself. This may provide the safest environment for initial contact.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character ARIA is a perfect embodiment of the project's goals. It is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned partner that uses its superior processing and monitoring capabilities to facilitate human moral growth and emotional healing. It respects privacy, provides objective moral guidance, and proactively manages logistics to minimize human suffering without overriding human agency.
